event_text: m_c found a small little patch of bright yellow flowers in camp, and snagged one to decorate {PRONOUN/m_c/self} with!
r_c takes m_c by surprise, swiftly decorating m_c with pretty yellow blooms. Bewildered, m_c thanks {PRONOUN/r_c/object} for the gift.
m_c purrs as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/stretch/stretches} smugly in the middle of camp, showing off the new purple blooms that decorate {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.
r_c, inbetween grooming m_c, gently dots m_c's fur with shades of purple flowers during a low sunset.
m_c plucks a few marigolds from a nearby flower patch. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wear/wears} it with poise.
r_c, inbetween grooming m_c, tucks marigolds next to m_c's ear. m_c almost doesn't notice the next morning, and purrs a thank you to r_c when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/walk/walks} by.

m_c's eyes sparkle as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/realize/realizes} something wonderful --- {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can propagate the bamboo on the edges of c_n territory, and decorate {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest with it! A week later, m_c is seen sleeping soundly with leafy stalks of bamboo casting shadows on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.

r_c has a wonderful idea for decorating m_c's nest! m_c wakes up in the middle of the night with bamboo brushing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} face. Despite the slight scare it gave m_c, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/thank/thanks} r_c in the morning for the nice surprise.
